name: Murazu
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Murazu is a platformer for the android AX-40-BM, whose planet was attacked and blown up. Now he has to travel through fragments from his native planet and take revenge on those who arranged this all.

- Simple, easy-to-learn controls, directions and jumps (Easy to master, difficult to become a master)
- Varied and dynamically changing levels
- Huge terrible bosses
- Nostalgic "pixel" design
- Dynamic-fantastic-retro-soundtrack
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
